queries.Engineer_queues: SELECT Account.Name, CreatedDate, Contact.Name, Owner.Name, Owner.Alias, Product__r.Name, Severity__c, Status, Subject, Description, CaseNumber, Time_Before_Next_Update_Commitment__c, Id, LastModifiedDate FROM Case WHERE (Status_Closed__c = FALSE AND ((Product__r.Name IN ({product_name}) AND Owner.Name IN ({support_group})) OR (Owner.Name LIKE '%{engineer_name}%'))) ORDER BY Owner.Name DESC
queries.Engineer_opened_today: SELECT CaseNumber, Product__r.Name, Owner.Name FROM Case WHERE CreatedDate = TODAY AND Product__r.Name IN ({product_name}) AND Owner.Name IN ({support_engineer_list})
queries.Manager: SELECT CaseNumber, Product__r.Name, Time_Before_Next_Update_Commitment__c, Status, Milestone_Target_Date__c, Owner.Name FROM Case WHERE Status_Closed__c = FALSE AND ((Owner.Name IN ({support_group}) AND Time_Before_Next_Update_Commitment__c <= 4.03125) OR (Owner.Name IN ({team_list}) AND Time_Before_Next_Update_Commitment__c > 0 AND Time_Before_Next_Update_Commitment__c <= 1)) ORDER BY Time_Before_Next_Update_Commitment__c ASC
